Method Detail

resolve

public static final org.apache.http.HttpEntity resolve(Object genericEntity)

Discovers which implementation of HttpEntity is suitable for wrapping the given object. This discovery proceeds in the following order by checking the runtime-type of the object:

  1. org.apache.http.HttpEntity --> returned as-is.
  2. byte[], Byte[] --> ByteArrayEntity
  3. java.io.File --> FileEntity
  4. java.io.InputStream --> BufferedHttpEntity
  5. CharSequence --> StringEntity
  6. java.io.Serializable --> SerializableEntity (with an internal buffer)

Parameters:
genericEntity - a generic reference to an object whose concrete HttpEntity is to be resolved

Returns:
the resolved concrete HttpEntity implementation

Throws:
NullPointerException - if the supplied generic type was null

EntityResolutionFailedException - if the given generic instance failed to be translated to an HttpEntity

Since:
1.3.0

resolve

public static final Class<?> resolve(Class<?> genericType)

Discovers the HttpEntity which is suitable for wrapping an instance of the given Class. This discovery proceeds in the following order by checking the provided generic type:

  1. org.apache.http.HttpEntity --> returned as-is.
  2. byte[], Byte[] --> ByteArrayEntity
  3. java.io.File --> FileEntity
  4. java.io.InputStream --> BufferedHttpEntity
  5. CharSequence --> StringEntity
  6. java.io.Serializable --> SerializableEntity (with an internal buffer)

Parameters:
genericType - a generic Class to be translated to an HttpEntity type

Returns:
the Class of the translated HttpEntity

Throws:
NullPointerException - if the supplied generic type was null

EntityResolutionFailedException - if the given generic Class failed to be translated to an HttpEntity type

Since:
1.3.0
